name: CubeHunt
description:
You hunt cubes and gain points lol.

Development started: 10th August 2022

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Shift - Sprint

Right click - Aim

Left click - Shoot

Platforms supported:
Windows 10

PC Requirements:

Haven't tested but runs at 1080p 25FPS on:

Ryzen 5 3500U with Radeon Vega 8

8GB RAM (2GB reserved for iGPU)

Windows 10

Made with Unity 2020.3.30f1, all assets are created by GaryTheBlobfishDev
